## Project Overview

**Objective**
Estimate the association between indwelling arterial catheter (IAC) use and 28-day mortality among mechanically ventilated adult ICU patients.

**Data source**
MIMIC-III (PostgreSQL, AWS RDS)

**Study design**

## Why this project matters (RWE relevance)

-   Emulates a **target trial** under real EHR constraints
-   Explicit handling of **immortal time bias**
-   Clear separation of **time zero vs exposure window**
-   Reproducible SQL-first cohort construction
